remark.ch:
1.限生科系植物暨微生物環境生物組博士生一年級
2.與LS6005B、LS6017B、LS7003B合併上課

goal.ch:
1. 針對學生在科學研究上之「邏輯思考」，「自我學習」及「闡述表達」方面作積極之訓練。
2. 擴增學生對現今生命科學領域「深度」及「廣度」之瞭解。
3. 同儕審視研究內容之練習
goal.en:
1. 針對學生在科學研究上之「邏輯思考」，「自我學習」及「闡述表達」方面作積極之訓練。
2. 擴增學生對現今生命科學領域「深度」及「廣度」之瞭解。
3. 同儕審視研究內容之練習

outline.ch:
週次，內容
1. Global warming and its effects on living organism
2. Plant heat tolerance
3. Plant sugar sensing
4. MYB transcription factors in plant responses to environmental stress
5. RNA helicase and plant stress acclimation
6. RNA silencing for crop improvement
7. Signal transduction of neuron cells
8. Water transport and aquaporin
9. Mid-term discussion
10. Microbial remediation
11. Microbial bio-farming
12.  Environmental hormone
13. Bio-fuel
14. Detergent and environment
15. Biological clock
16. G protein coupled signal transduction
17. Molecular pain
18. Final conclusion and discussion
outline.en:
“Week, Contents
1. Global warming and its effects on living organism
2. Plant heat tolerance
3. Plant sugar sensing
4. MYB transcription factors in plant responses to environmental stress
5. RNA helicase and plant stress acclimation
6. RNA silencing for crop improvement
7. Signal transduction of neuron cells
8. Water transport and aquaporin
9. Mid-term discussion
10. Microbial remediation
11. Microbial bio-farming
12.  Environmental hormone
13. Bio-fuel
14. Detergent and environment
15. Biological clock
16. G protein coupled signal transduction
17. Molecular pain
18. Final conclusion and discussion“
